name: Natalia Noriega
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
I am writing to express my interest in the Budtender position as advertised online and have attached my budtender resume and recent photos for your review.

My decision to apply for this position was based strictly on the fact that I truly believe in the healing powers of Medical Marijuana and the benefits it offers to patients in need. 

I also have my Bachelors degree in Business / Marketing and experience as a Budtender which has equipped me with a multitude of business and customer service skills. I feel I am the ideal candidate for this position being that I am a professional with good energy who can assist in creating a positive and fun environment for your patients.
Other highlights of my background that may be of interest to you include:
Valid Doctor’s Recommendation and CA Driver’s License
Knowledge of marijuana strains and gram weights
Naturally tech savvy (PC, MAC, iPad), social media savvy (Instagram, Twitter, FaceBook, Blogging, LinkedIn, etc), and advanced in MS Office, Outlook, Adobe Suite, & QuickBooks
Accustomed to interfacing and liaising with high-end clients and maintaining the highest level of confidentiality and discretion.
Flexible hours, reliable transportation, and extremely punctual and reliable
Located in North Hollywood
Amazing references from my corporate positions (L’Oreal and HCT Group - separate resume)
Although my accompanying resume illustrates my background well, I feel that a personal interview would better demonstrate my knowledge and abilities.

Thank you for your review and consideration.

Sincerely,
Natalia Noriega
